title: STEAM-Based Digital Systems Thinking Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Project-based learning environment for strengthening digital transformation skills of current secondary education practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can describe three or more creative problem-solving strategies required in STEAM education.
Learners complete over 80% of math modeling tasks using immersive learning tools (VR/AR).
Learners create a digital portfolio analyzing real-life problems by applying a systems thinking framework.
Learners can propose two or more STEAM education design principles considering ethical technology use.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
